channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: George Clooney Says His 8-Year-Old Twins Alexander and Ella 'Still Dig' Him, Though His Daughter Has Started 'Rolling Her Eyes'

item.title: Quentin Tarantino Calls Actor Paul Dano 'a Big Giant Flaw' in “There Will Be Blood”: He's 'a Weak, Uninteresting Guy'
